attributes.action: The International students be given full free medical and dental treatment including medicines
attributes.additional_details:
International students who contribute much to UK economy are not fully facilitated in terms of benefits given to others. If the student has his/her family, no benefits like free school meal or other benefits which are given to others are not allowed. Similarly, the health and dental facilities are not extended to the.
Only free diagnosing by GP is not sufficient. A student having teeth problem has to pay equally which he/she some time cannot afford to pay.
I therefore would request that the NHS should review its policy and given free medical and dental facilities to all International students.
